name: Blue Manager
summary: Property maintenance app with OCR and Supabase backend.

name: rickym270.github.io
summary: Personal site to be used to host notes, tuts and projects. This site originally started as a means to teach python.

name: ErrorChecker
summary: NightChecker developed to automate the process of going into every script to check for errors. An email is sent out to me every morning with an OK or an Error subject to let me know which scripts/applications failed overnight. This class is incorporated throughout various tools.

name: GenGraph
summary: Developed to make it easier to develop graphs out of obtained data to be displayed on a webpage.

name: F5Requests
summary: Developed library to obtain information from F5 devices easily.

name: F5_SDK
summary: Get some relevant information from F5SDK and save to db.

name: ConnectivityMonitor
summary: Developed to monitor all connections in the network via ping, tcp or udp.

name: Auth
summary: Very simple authorization script that gives/restricts access of features based on username.

name: IPRequests
summary: A lightweight toolkit for making, logging, and analyzing IP-based HTTP requests. IPRequests provides utilities and/or a small CLI and library interface to issue requests bound to specific source IPs, collect metadata, perform IP lookups, and generate reports.

name: gPhotographyPHP
summary: PHP version of gPhotography with a few extras.

name: Muscribe
summary: No description because it is still a work-in-progress.
